page.title: 10OUR HOUSES IN THE BLOCK
page.content: Several of us live in houses included in our survey:1.My house,Northmead cottage,Blackpond Lane,was originally a coachman's house built 1887.Since then it has been altered much and is now three times the size.Our garage is the stables and coachhouse,we believe that there is a ghost there! 2."Holcombe" is my house in Crown lane in Farnham Royal.It was named by previous owners who moved from Holcombe in Devon.It was built in 1932.We moved there in 4/1/1979.We have extended it since then.Crown Lane has four different aspects;1.Several detatched houses at the bottom.2.Kennedy's garden centre,Crown house.3.The Crown Pub and Allerds House(See page 9).4.Nine detached house of character up at the top of the hill.
